mapper.select: SELECT ct0.disabled memDisabled, t1.id, t1.roomOwner, t1.roomId FROM ddw_goodfriendplay_room_member t1 INNER JOIN ddw_goodfriendplay_room ct0 ON ct0.id = t1.roomId AND ct0.disabled = 0 AND ct0.STATUS <= 20 WHERE t1.`userId` = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT t1.disabled memDisabled, 1, t1.roomOwner, t1.id roomId FROM ddw_goodfriendplay_room t1 WHERE t1.roomOwner = #{userId} AND t1.disabled = 0 AND t1.STATUS <= 20
